Package org.fuchss.tools.lambda

Class LambdaConvert

java.lang.Object
org.fuchss.tools.lambda.LambdaConvert
public final class LambdaConvert extends Object
A converter class to convert Functions/Consumers .. with Exception to "normal" Functions/Consumers/..
Author:
Dominik Fuchss
